website_summaries.verdict: A great moisturizer for sensitive skin that provides serious moisture without clogging pores.
pros: Features ceramides and lipids to strengthen and moisturize your skin, and enzymes and vitamins to reduce inflammation
Fragrance-free, absorbs well, and helps minimize fine lines
cons: Since it does not contain any fragrance, some buyers said it had a slightly unpleasant smell

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: Best facial moisturizer I have ever tried. I have spent serious money on facial cleansers and moisturizers over the years. I don't put anything on my face that isn't high quality. I recently had a outbreak of adult hormonal acne. My dermatologist treated me with a retinol product which severely dried out my skin. He said to try this but because of its low price point I didn't think it would work well. I tried about six or seven high-end moisturizers. One cost more than $200, this beat every single one of them. This product works amazingly well and the best value out there as far as I'm concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Made the most difference
customer_reviews.text: My husband’s dermatologist recommended he use this after treatment for early stage skin cancer. I started using it and he told me to get my own bottle. I am 63 years old and have tried many different types of skin repair cream...Clinique, Boots No 7...while I really like these, I’ve noticed the most difference in my skin tone and the minimalization of fine wrinkles with EltaMD Barrier Renewal. I will definitely will be using this for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: B. Heath

customer_reviews.title: I love Elta MD products!
customer_reviews.text: I am 50 years old and have mild rosacea. I am also going through peri-menopause and have trouble with some moisturizers heating up my cheeks. I wanted a non-comogenic moisturizer (won't clog pores) for sensitive skin. I currently use the Elta MD sunscreen spf46 for sensitive skin (rosacea, etc). I received this product and have been using for 2 days. It is light weight and super moisturizer! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Zoeygirl

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny. My Derm told me about this ...
customer_reviews.text: worth every penny. My Derm told me about this. I have very sensitive acne prone skin (even at 37 yrs old) and this heals all. small layer Differen 1-2 times per week, then this every night. Mornings ELTA tinted moisture. This regimen has made a huge improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin & Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell, seems like a knockoff or old product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not the original formula that I have purchased from dermatology offices in the past. It smelled strange and stings when applied.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff, my skin nhas completely changed. I only wish it had SPF in it so I wouldn't have to put another moisturizer on top. I would not order this item through Amazon again though, the Elta MD webiste does not endorse their products being sold on Amazon due to the possibility of counterfiet products. I would highly reccommend ordering through the Derm Store.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Mazzoleni

customer_reviews.title: Horrible for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Horrible for sensitive skin. I've used other EltaMD products with no problem, so I thought this would help with my dryness. And I did feel a bit less dry, but my skin broke out in a rash of little red bumps.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for under other products!
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is not suitable for under other products. I keep finding that it doesn’t absorb properly and when you put makeup or another product over it, it becomes gummy and flakes off. It’s the weirdest thing! I’ve tried waiting 15-20 min before adding my makeup in the AM or retinoids in the PM, and that doesn’t seem to help. Will not be buying again. It’s a bummer, because I love EltaMD’s sunscreens.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin S

customer_reviews.title: Instant results!
customer_reviews.text: Having originally intended to purchase the EltaMD PM Therapy, I noticed this product and its positive reviews. I gave it a shot. Wowwww. After only one night's use, my skin feels 20 years softer and the redness has diminished. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: D. G. Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Amazing skin smoother
customer_reviews.text: Smooths and tightens skins instantly- including pores! I use it under makeup and since I started using it I often go out without any makeup bc it’s helped my complexion and pores so much- I’m 50 never thought I’d go out w/out makeup to hide my pores!
customer_reviews.author: L. Macri

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey, but great skin isn't cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Writing this under my fathers account: My esthetician recommended I try this after a bad allergic reaction to Clinique (can you believe it?!) I didn't know how I felt about spending $45 on a small bottle of face cream; but I'm extremely glad that I did. It's a thicker cream, and the pump allows me to control how much I use. Within 2 days of first using it; my skin was smooth, dewy-like, and extremely soft. I'll continue buying this, because I absolutely think it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: David L Sewell

customer_reviews.title: I dont like the price but...
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed a extremely huge difference in my skin. I have been told that I look younger than my age. And I know it's true as I have seen a difference. I cringe when I buy it but love what I see in the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting Dupe
customer_reviews.text: Watch out, yellowish, stinky, pillow-sticking, greasy mess. Guess I have been lucky on previous orders but Amazon proved to me this time they are not an authorized EltaMD dealer. Now I know. I will not ever order skin care or sunscreen from Amazon again. Hope this helps you. Save yourself several day’s time, order directly from EltaMD
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Great for Men!
customer_reviews.text: Great product to use in dry climates... I live in Arizona, and always have been on the "look out" for products that offer healthy looking skin for men. This has been the best i've found in the past decade. Terrific product! I'm in the sun a lot, and this offers great rejuvenation and seems to help with my aging.... i'm around 50, so yeah, trying to stay healthy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stotts

customer_reviews.title: Skincare Must
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite moisturizer. It keeps my skin hydrated, supple and radiant. I will not use anything else. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Dee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This my facial moisturizing lotion. I use it daily and my skin is smooth and dewy looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: too expenses for what it is
customer_reviews.text: I love their sunscreen but this doesn't seem to be doing anything for me (I have very dry skin and expected more given their dermatology background). Maybe it's more subtle? But I gave it three bottle and I am switching. Maybe I'll try their PM therapy instead or just stick with my cheap lotion.
customer_reviews.author: moon

customer_reviews.title: Healthy skin again!!
customer_reviews.text: I had rosacea on my face and tried several products which only served to irritate my sensitive skin. I tried eltaMD. Along with a med my dermatologist prescribed eltaMD keeps my skin healthy. I also use the moisturizer tinted and facial sunscreen. Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Gene Marie

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Skin feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It was recommended by my dermatologist. The lotion has the thickness of a body lotion, but rubs in wonderfully. I suggest you wait 5 to 10 minutes before applying foundation. I usually don’t like to spend this amount of money on a product, but I will definitely continue to use it. In fact I’ve already purchased more!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a visible improvement in fine lines. Will say though that it absorbs maybe a little too well for my taste. I would use it as my night moisturizer and I generally prefer something thicker and more occlusive at night. Putting something like Vaseline over this is totally an option though.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommended this product and I really liked it. I use Retin-A and I needed something that didn't have a lot of glycolic acid in it. This is perfect. I was buying it from my dermatologist but it is so much easier to have it delivered to your door.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rimolt

customer_reviews.title: Breakouts at the beginning...
customer_reviews.text: ...But I waited it out coz I noticed my dark spots became lighter! So quickly! Zits went away eventually. Will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Mom-and-Z

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This product it’s amazing. I live in the NE and it’s very cold. Every winter my skin flakes around my nose. For the first time my skin it’s so moisturized and feels amazing in the winter time!! Very pleased! I love that it’s fragrance free!
customer_reviews.author: Ap

customer_reviews.title: So far , so good.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for 3 weks and I can telll the differences in my face skin. Depends on the type of skin, age, etc, but for me it works (54 years old, mixed skin)
customer_reviews.author: Soni

customer_reviews.title: I love this lotion for my combination skin!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 8 months ago and I am loving it thus far! I started getting really oily all of a sudden with my old moisturizer so I switched. My skin feels smoother and I don’t get as oily anymore. It’s surprisingly hydrating, but I still find myself using a richer moisturizer from time to time when my skin feels extra dry.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit product
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product be ordered from amazon. It had a strange odor when it arrived. I know there is a lot of counterfeit beauty products on amazon and I do not think this is the real product. Unfortunately I was a month after the 30 day return window and amazon would not take it back. I confirmed with an author rep that the odor is not normal.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A.

customer_reviews.title: A great product and not overpriced!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I’d try this because I love their facial sunscreen. Which is the only one I’ve ever used that didn’t make my face break out. They both go on beautifully and absorb quickly without feeling greasy.
customer_reviews.author: jjputnam

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED & STUNK
customer_reviews.text: In want to start by saying I love Elta MD products. I have used the brand for years. I've been unable to find the barrier renewal complex locally so my only choice was to purchase it online and you can't purchase it directly. This product would have been great if it wasn't EXPIRED. The smell was terrible. I tried using it 3-4 times but the smell was so terrible I ended up tossing it. Complete waste of money. I wish I could describe just how awful the smell was. I ended up using my husband's face lotion to get me by. Again, Elta MD is a wonderful line but only if it's not expired. So gross.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing Lotion dreamy
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this feels. There’s not perfuming smell either. Non greasy! Perfect! Couldn’t be happier. Just wish they could cut the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Riiff

customer_reviews.title: Notice a difference
customer_reviews.text: Definitely notice a different after a couple of weeks for fine lines. Tighter skin. Doesn’t feel greasy. Don’t love the smell but it’s not a bad smell. Goes away quick
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pump got stuck just a week after I got it......so disappointed and its not cheap either.....
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with this moisturizer and also the PM moisturizer from ...
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with this moisturizer and also the PM moisturizer from Elta MD. I was waking up every morning with at LEAST 5 whiteheads on a regular basis no matter what lotion I was using and once I started using these moisturizers, I wake up to even, whitehead-free skin! I think my skin really loves the niacinamide in both products. I have been using both products for at least 3 months and will continue using them from here on out!
customer_reviews.author: BKallDay

customer_reviews.title: Causes breakouts!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if this was fake or what but I broke out everywhere and Elta products never make me break out
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Owings

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT COMES OPENED
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer but the seller sends the products opened. There is no seal.
customer_reviews.author: alicias96

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love elta md products. Best for my sensitive combination skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Smell
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and I love it. However the one I recently received has a terrible smell. Too nasty to be used. It seems that it is expired. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M. Santana

customer_reviews.title: Non greasy I have noticed a healthy visible difference in reduced fine lines and wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: I have been asked what I'm using by friends. I have recommended the product and my friends have promptly purchased it. This is my evidence a product is working when my friends see a difference in my skin and they want the same for themselves!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love all of the EltaMD skincare line. No fragrance, easy absorption, easy to apply. Wish that laroger sizes were available.
customer_reviews.author: joeySum

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey so shop around.
customer_reviews.text: I'd been using this for years and I love it. Not greasy and not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet B.

customer_reviews.title: It works great for a daily moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Barrier Renewal for a few months now, like the way it makes my skin feel.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Harder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommended this moisturizer to me. All of Elta MD products are good.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: My skin is sensitive to a variety of things. I tried some new products and it gave my skin a horrible rash around my eyes and felt like my skin was dried out and burning. I was using this daily and then used this to help increase moisture back to my poor skin after the other products I was sampling and it helped. Before that I was using it as a moisturizer. I love it. I also use the Elta Daily Broad Spectrum over it or I use it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked it better if it didn't have an odor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got a sample from a dermatologist liked it so much I ordered it
customer_reviews.author: s.sprague

customer_reviews.title: Barrier Renewal
customer_reviews.text: At 70...practically no wrinkles...this is working for me (ok, plus their sunscreen products)
customer_reviews.author: Nan 22

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I'm not sure why this stuff is recommended by dermatologists. It doesn't do anything worth spending 45-50$.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Barringer

customer_reviews.title: I love how this smooths my skin
customer_reviews.text: I love how this smooths my skin. It's a nice alternative to other types of creams. My skin is also moisturized well.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki R.

customer_reviews.title: I tried this product on a whim and LOVE it! My skin has significantly better tone and ...
customer_reviews.text: I discovered Elta MD from a nurse practitioner, after seeking laser treatments for my adult-onset acne. I have combination skin, acne-prone but also dry and crepe-y. Elta MD products are the only products that will hydrate my skin and not cause me to break out. I tried this product on a whim and LOVE it! My skin has significantly better tone and texture, smaller pores, and no breakouts. I wear a lot less makeup and have not had to go in for another laser treatment since trying this product. Sometimes the product alone is enough for a moisturizer, and sometimes I have to layer a thicker moisturizer on top once this one soaks in. Regardless, my skin loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Schellinger

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with this product. I have very dry skin and other reviews said this was very hydrating.I did not find it to be at all moisutrizing for my skin. I will use it up but would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and the price is right. I'll be buying it again!
customer_reviews.author: bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Best Moisturizer Ever
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is wonderful. Light and smooth... No greasy feeling at all. Does not cause breakouts and keeps your skin hydrated all day long... Your skin glows after use....
customer_reviews.author: Bossmann_1999

customer_reviews.title: Not as moisturized as I was hoping for daily use ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as moisturized as I was hoping for daily use. And, I have been getting ACNE from using this, not sure if it is because I accidentally got some of the EltaMD eye renewal gel on my face, or the toner/serum that I applied underneath this moisturizer. I also have not notice any different or improvement on my skin after 1 month of using. Cons: Reasonable price compare to my other high end department store brand.
customer_reviews.author: tester

customer_reviews.title: Great moisture - very thick
customer_reviews.text: Great moisture - very thick, but that's about all it does. I did not see any skin texture, tone or wrinkle improvement, and for the price I think there are better moisturizers out there.
customer_reviews.author: Kbee

customer_reviews.title: Really, I've used the 49% sun screen for years ...
customer_reviews.text: Really, I've used the 49% sun screen for years. I thought the entire line would work for me. Not so. Most of the additional items made my skin itch. Sensitive, Irish skin
customer_reviews.author: MniceAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My plastic surgeon recommended the Elta MD and I like it so well ...
customer_reviews.text: My plastic surgeon recommended the Elta MD and I like it so well I tried this Elta MD product as well. Goes on with a silky touch and moisturizes very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy L. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer! My Dermatologist recommended this to me and now I know why! My skin feels great.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin - this moisturizer made my face breakout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... am a 60 yo woman who has taken very good care of my skin
customer_reviews.text: I am a 60 yo woman who has taken very good care of my skin. My face is dry and I was hoping this would replienish moisture some. It has not done ANYTHING for my skin. Oh well......
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great brand of products!
customer_reviews.text: Best moisturizer! Given to me by skin specialist who provides my laser therapy for roseasa. Love the texture, not greasy. Changed the way my skin looks & feels as far as dry & oil combo skin. Also recommend the 46 spf in the am under makeup. Great products & cheaper thru Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Bob K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin, but not the best at moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I really do like how suitable this product is for sensitive skin. Great to keep pores from getting clogged, but I feel like it needs some work on moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

product_meta.title: EltaMD Barrier Renewal Complex Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Works to Visibly Minimize Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Hydrating Nightime Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
product_meta.description:
This facial moisturizer is clinically proven to moisturize and improve dry, compromised skin within 24 hours. This advanced formula works to visibly minimize the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while improving skin texture and tone.

BRAND STORY
EltaMD Skin Care is committed to helping you have great skin for life. Our company has developed sunscreen, skin care products and wound healing products trusted by physicians for more than 25 years.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
